lang_2: The secrets of the land are not visible to all.
lang_3: Without Hunter's vision, the echoes of the land are lost in the wind.
lang_4: You need to be on duty to track presences in these lands.
lang_5: Only trained eyes can follow the trail of those who wander.
lang_6: The veil of the land covers its travelers
lang_7: The paths are hidden to those without the eye of duty.
